resources.string: This free utility performs the boring task of Calculating your CPGA, just add all your Courses and grades in the table below

NOTE: Click the Add Course button below to add Your Courses in the following format -

COURSE CODE: Usually 3-digit, not necessarily distinct for each subject
COURSE UNIT: Unit for the entered Course - It must be a digit
GRADE SCORED: Grade scored - Valid Grades are A,B,C,D,E,F

To remove a Course from the Table, simply click the x button next to the given course row

Click the Add Course button to display the Input Buttons
After entering the fields in the Order listed above, Click Add button to add the given entries into the Table.

In case of Invalid inputs, an Error message is displayed, Click the OK button and try again with Valid Inputs
